author: Nico Lang, Michelle Garcia
title: Coronavirus Finance Troubles Have Hit LGBTQ People Extra Hard
description: Queer people are twice as likely to report being much worse off now  than they were in 2019, in the face of the pandemic shutting down most businesses.
content:
A new report finds that LGBTQ people are disproportionately likely to have been economically impacted by COVID-19. 
A survey of 1,000 U.S. adults released Thursday found that LGBTQ people were 36 percent more likely than the general population to have lost w… [+5045 chars]
